name: Thomas Wright
interest: Site Reliability Engineer focused on system observability and incident response

projects.title: Observability Platform

insights.description: Detected and resolved 95% of incidents before customer impact

SRE requirement: System must emit structured logs, metrics, and traces with < 1% overhead. Alert on SLO violations with 5-minute detection time
